Re: what dumb fuckin retard thing is behind this world? why would you claim to be god of this world?
the entity who claims that he is the god of this world, is a psychopath, who desires Power ... ruling over a speciees of Humans that have the potential to excel - collectively - his species
This entity has sucessfully concealed the Truth about Humanities Origins and Destiny from six species, previous to his "discovery" of Earth - using the agenda outlined in the Uranta book ... and it almost worked here - until the internet allowed us to compare notes
"god" uses his advanced technology to genetically alter this species, he can't "live" here, so he doesn't care what happens here --- as long as this species worships him, and gives him "the glory" instead of our true Creator ... his greatest achievement was to get us to kill our fellow man - for his (nameless) name's sake
this "god" understands (from previous failed attempts) that when he reduces the population of Humans, the Earth reduces its production of the things that sustain LIFE ... so he has allowed us to multiply - to give his followers the opportunity to gain an unfair advantage over us ... until these "elite" are fully prepared - to control "the masses" after "god" has drastically reduced their numbers, with GMOs, vaccines and chemicals (including radiation) in our food, water and air ... and an inequitable society
god established four Hierarchies (Culture Religion Politics and Science) to suppress Consciousness of who we are, our potential, and what we are participating in of our own free will
now he is trying desperately to limit our communication via the world wide web ...but it is too late - because even a child understands that this "god" provides NOTHING, and is only serving himself - using lies to manipulate us, and the only thing he has ever created was Evil ( using his "son" Lucifer and his demons to enforce his laws upon members of his stolen "kingdom"
Humanity has woken up to the fact that our true Creator loves us so much and is so concerned for our well-being, that he designed Nature, to provide for our EVERY NEED
UNCONDITIONALLY
and all that he has ever asked, is that while we are exercising our Free Will - that we "Do unto others, as we would have them do unto us" --- because when we don't we punish ourselves
This "reality" is only one of Earth's many dimensions ... if you ever hope to "graduate" the Third Dimension, you must "do the right thing" and Master your emotions - or you will remain here, until you do
Death is a choice ... whether you believe it or not
